EmailTemplate.description: Ops 1-2, Science, and Finance Email Notification - for internal notice
EmailTemplate.name: Ops Science Finance Email Notification - Notice Only
EmailTemplate.subject: {!TASKRAY__Project__c.Name} External Vendor Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To Whom It May Concern:
The following request for a preferred vendor was submitted for approval:
To view the Request Form, please click here. https://cs65.salesforce.com/{!Preferred_Vendor_Request__c.Id} To view the Salesforce Opportunity, please click here. https://cs65.salesforce.com/{!Preferred_Vendor_Request__c.Opportunity_ID__c}
Thank you.
